snippet: The playwright Simon Stephens is hoping for his breakout moment in New York with “Harper Regan,” which is in previews at Atlantic Theater Company.
abstract: Playwright Simon Stephens is hoping for his breakout moment in New York with his Off Broadway play Harper Regan, which is in previews at Atlantic Theater Company; Stephens originally wanted to write a play exploring how male desires can conflict with morality from a man's point of view, but found it more interesting to tell story from the perspective of his middle-aged wife.
lead_paragraph: The playwright Simon Stephens is hoping for his breakout moment in New York with “Harper Regan,” which is in previews at Atlantic Theater Company.
